content.query:
create or alter view vw_sapisu_0bp_cat_text
as
select *
from openrowset(
        BULK 'https://sadafdev01.dfs.core.windows.net/raw/sapisu/0bp_cat_text/delta/*.parquet',
        FORMAT='PARQUET'
    ) with (
            [EXTRACT_DATETIME] varchar(100),
            [EXTRACT_RUN_ID] bigint,
            [KEY1] varchar(100),
            [LANGU] varchar(100),
            [ODQ_CHANGEMODE] varchar(100),
            [ODQ_ENTITYCNTR] bigint,
            [TXTLG] varchar(100),
            [_DLRawZoneTimeStamp] datetime2(7),
            [year] varchar(4),
            [month] varchar(2),
            [day] varchar(2)
           ) as rows

create or alter view vw_sapisu_ehauisu
as
select *
from openrowset(
        BULK 'https://sadafdev01.dfs.core.windows.net/raw/sapisu/ehauisu/delta/*.parquet',
        FORMAT='PARQUET'
    ) with (
            [/SAPCE/IURU_IED] varchar(100),
            [/SAPCE/IURU_IEDO] varchar(100),
            [COUNC] varchar(100),
            [CRM_GUID] varchar(100),
            [EXTRACT_DATETIME] varchar(100),
            [EXTRACT_RUN_ID] bigint,
            [HAUS] varchar(100),
            [MANDT] varchar(100),
            [REGIOGROUP] varchar(100),
            [REGIOGROUP_PERM] varchar(100),
            [REGPOLIT] varchar(100),
            [_DLRawZoneTimeStamp] datetime2(7),
            [year] varchar(4),
            [month] varchar(2),
            [day] varchar(2)
           ) as rows

create or alter view vw_access_z309_tpropmeter
as
select *
from openrowset(
        BULK 'https://sadafdev01.dfs.core.windows.net/raw/access/z309_tpropmeter/delta/*.parquet',
        FORMAT='PARQUET'
    ) with (
            [N_PROP] varchar(100),
            [N_PROP_METE] varchar(100),
            [N_METE_READ_ROUT] varchar(100),
            [C_METE_TYPE] varchar(100),
            [C_METE_READ_FREQ] varchar(100),
            [C_METE_GRID_LOCA] varchar(100),
            [C_READ_INST_NUM1] varchar(100),
            [C_READ_INST_NUM2] varchar(100),
            [F_METE_ADDI_DESC] varchar(100),
            [F_METE_ROUT_PREP] varchar(100),
            [F_METE_WARN_NOTE] varchar(100),
            [D_METE_FIT] varchar(100),
            [N_METE_READ_SEQU] varchar(100),
            [C_METE_POSI_STAT] varchar(100),
            [C_METE_CHAN_REAS] varchar(100),
            [N_METE_CHAN_ADVI] varchar(100),
            [D_METE_REMO] varchar(100),
            [F_METE_CONN] varchar(100),
            [N_METE_MAKE] varchar(100),
            [D_PROP_METE_UPDA] varchar(100),
            [C_METE_CLAS] varchar(100),
            [C_METE_CATE] varchar(100),
            [C_METE_GROU] varchar(100),
            [C_METE_READ_LOCA] varchar(100),
            [T_METE_SERV] varchar(100),
            [_DLRawZoneTimeStamp] datetime2(7),
            [year] varchar(4),
            [month] varchar(2),
            [day] varchar(2)
           ) as rows


create or alter view vw_access_z309_tmeterreading
as
select *
from openrowset(
        BULK 'https://sadafdev01.dfs.core.windows.net/raw/access/z309_tmeterreading/delta/*.parquet',
        FORMAT='PARQUET'
    ) with (
           [N_PROP] varchar(100),
            [N_PROP_METE] varchar(100),
            [N_METE_READ] varchar(100),
            [C_METE_READ_TOLE] varchar(100),
            [C_METE_READ_TYPE] varchar(100),
            [C_METE_READ_CONS] varchar(100),
            [C_METE_READ_STAT] varchar(100),
            [C_METE_CANT_READ] varchar(100),
            [C_PDE_READ_METH] varchar(100),
            [Q_METE_READ] varchar(100),
            [D_METE_READ] varchar(100),
            [T_METE_READ_TIME] varchar(100),
            [Q_METE_READ_CONS] varchar(100),
            [Q_METE_READ_DAYS] varchar(100),
            [F_READ_COMM_CODE] varchar(100),
            [F_READ_COMM_FREE] varchar(100),
            [Q_PDE_HIGH_LOW] varchar(100),
            [Q_PDE_REEN_COUN] varchar(100),
            [F_PDE_AUXI_READ] varchar(100),
            [D_METE_READ_UPDA] varchar(100),
            [_DLRawZoneTimeStamp] datetime2(7),
            [year] varchar(4),
            [month] varchar(2),
            [day] varchar(2)
           ) as rows
